court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fourteenth District, Houston.

opinion.posture:
Original Proceeding.
Writ of Mandamus.
Petition Denied.
opinion.panel: Panel consists of Justices YATES, FOWLER, and HUDSON.
opinion.opinion_text: On January 27, 2004, relator filed a petition for writ of mandamus in this Court. See Tex. Gov't CODE ANN. ยง 22.221 (Vernon Supp. 2003);see also TEX. R. APP. P. 52. Relator seeks to vacate the trial court's order of January 13, 2004, which denied relator's motion to compel discovery of a legal brief. Alpert has failed to provide this Court with the brief that was presented to the trial court in camera. As a party seeking mandamus relief, Alpert has the burden of providing this court with a sufficient record to establish his right to relief. Walker v.Packer, 827 S.W.2d 833, 837 (Tex. 1992). The record does not establish relator's right to relief in this case. Accordingly, we deny relator's petition for writ of mandamus.
